items.title: Furnace
items.desc: The Furnace is your town HQ and the first construct you open.

items.title: Embassy
items.desc: A place for diplomacy and trade with other kingdoms.

items.title: Command Center
items.desc: Your central command post for all military operations.

items.title: Infirmary
items.desc: A place to heal your injured survivors.

items.title: Infantry Camp
items.desc: Train infantry units for your defense.

items.title: Lancer Camp
items.desc: Train lancer units for your defense.

items.title: Marksman Camp
items.desc: Train marksman units for your defense.

items.title: War Academy
items.desc: Train advanced units and unlock military strategies.

items.title: Crystal Laboratory
items.desc: Research new technologies using precious crystals.
